revised_title: A Voyage of Exploration and Discovery in the Late 17th Century
tldr: This book provides a detailed account of the author's extensive travels and voyages across various ports, places, and coasts, including descriptions of their geography, inhabitants, customs, and natural resources. The author shares his observations and experiences from different parts of the world, including the East and West Indies, Africa, and the South Sea, offering valuable insights into the cultures and environments he encountered.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Cultural Anthropology
